titulo: Novel solutions for off-grid storage of renewable energy for critical infrastructures
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all the following expected outcomes:Enhanced European knowledge and leadership in off-grid clean energy storage technologies.Improved energy security and cost-effectiveness of Europe's energy systems, particularly for critical infrastructure.Elimination of fossil-based backup solutions for critical infrastructures, strengthening European competitiveness. Scope:The topic aims to develop novel, cost-efficient off-grid energy storage so
